subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Television
lead_paragraph: For teams like Florida Gulf Coast, a live shot on TV after a team is chosen for the N.C.A.A. tournament is the equivalent of a free commercial, a way to introduce the program.
